arm_group.arm_group_label: Head and Neck Cancer patients receiving radiation therapy

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is to measure the two-year rate of tooth loss in patients who have
      received external beam radiation therapy with curative intent for head and neck cancer. The
      study will also evaluate the sequelae of radiation therapy and oral complications that may
      occur as a result to receiving radiation therapy.

clinical_study.brief_title: Observational Study of Dental Outcomes in Head and Neck Cancer Patients

detailed_description.textblock:
This is a prospective cohort study to document dental and other oral outcomes in patients
      who receive external beam radiation therapy with curative intent, as part of clinical care
      for a head and neck cancer. Seven hundred and fifty-six participants will be enrolled. All
      study participants will receive a baseline oral examination prior to the start of radiation
      therapy. Follow-up examinations and data collection will be conducted at six-month intervals
      up to 2 years after the start of radiation therapy. The primary outcome will be the two-year
      rate of tooth loss. Secondary outcomes will include measures of dental caries, periodontal
      health, salivary flow, and exposed bone/osteoradionecrosis.

      The proposed research will provide more information to inform the community about the
      sequelae of Radiation Therapy (RT) in head and neck cancer patients, to refine current
      guidelines and to design future studies on the dental management of these patients.

study_pop.textblock: Head and Neck Radiation Oncology patients

secondary_outcome.description: Two year incidence of exposed intraoral bone, suggestive of ORN. This will be defined as exposed maxillary or mandibular bone with an avascular appearance in a quadrant that has received RT
Two year change in DMFS - Decayed, Missing or Filled Surfaces Index
secondary_outcome.measure: Decayed, Missing or Filled Surfaces (DMFS) Index

secondary_outcome.description: Two year change in periodontal measures
18 month changes in stimulated whole salivary flow rates
Two year change in mouth opening in mm
Two year use of fluoride to prevent new caries
secondary_outcome.measure: Topical fluoride use for caries prevention

secondary_outcome.description: Two year chronic oral mucositis incidence
Two year change in radiation therapy-specific quality of life measures
secondary_outcome.measure: Quality of Life after Radiation Therapy

secondary_outcome.description: Two year change in pain scores as measured with the University of California at San Francisco (UCSF) oral cancer pain scale
